items.question: How long does it take to implement n8n automation?
items.answer: 3–7 days for standard workflows like WhatsApp replies or CRM sync. Complex projects with multiple integrations take up to 2 weeks. You receive progress updates every 3 days.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge to maintain the automation?
items.answer: No. Every deliverable includes step-by-step documentation with screenshots. Plus, you get 1 week of support where I answer questions and make any adjustments you need.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
items.answer: You receive the deliverable with revisions included until it works as you expected. No extra charge for adjustments within the original scope. If the project doesn't meet what was agreed, you don't pay.

items.question: Do you work with companies outside LATAM?
items.answer: Yes. I work 100% remotely with clients in LATAM, Europe, and the United States. Time zones are not a problem: I adapt to your schedule for meetings and deliverables.

items.question: Why hire a freelancer instead of an agency?
items.answer: Direct communication with me, no middlemen or overhead. Faster response, greater accountability, and significantly lower costs. You talk to the person doing the work, not an account manager.

items.question: What happens if I need support after delivery?
items.answer: Every project includes 1 week of post-delivery support. After that, I offer hourly support or monthly packages as needed. The included documentation allows your team to operate without depending on me.

items.question: How do you protect my company's data?
items.answer: I sign NDAs before each project. I use encrypted connections, private repositories, and follow the security best practices I apply in OWASP audits. Your information is never shared with third parties.

items.question: How much does an OWASP security audit cost?
items.answer: Cost depends on the scope: number of applications, APIs, and cloud configurations to review. Submit your project details and you'll receive a personalized proposal with exact pricing in 48 hours. No commitment required.

items.question: What is n8n and why use it for automation?
items.answer: n8n is an open-source automation platform that connects your tools (WhatsApp, CRM, email, databases) with visual workflows. Unlike Zapier or Make, n8n can be self-hosted, giving you full control over your data with no execution limits.

items.question: Can I automate WhatsApp with n8n?
items.answer: Yes. n8n integrates with the WhatsApp Business API to automate replies, send notifications, sync conversations with your CRM, and generate automatic reports from chat data. It's one of the most requested automations.

items.question: What's the difference between hiring a freelancer and an agency?
items.answer: With a freelancer, you talk directly to the person doing the work. No middlemen, no agency overhead, faster response times, and significantly lower costs. For well-scoped projects (automation, audits, infrastructure), a specialized freelancer delivers results faster than a generalist agency.

items.question: What countries do you work with?
items.answer: I work 100% remotely with clients in Mexico, LATAM, Europe, and the United States. I adapt to your timezone for meetings and deliverables. Most of my clients are in Mexico and LATAM, but I take on projects from anywhere in the world.

security.name: OWASP SECURITY AUDIT
security.heroDescription: I find the vulnerabilities that get companies hacked before someone else does. Complete OWASP Top 10 review, cloud configuration analysis, and executive report with priority and concrete action plan. For businesses in Mexico and remote teams handling sensitive data who need certainty they're protected.
security.problemTitle: THE RISK OF NOT KNOWING YOUR VULNERABILITIES
security.problemDescription: A single data breach can cost months of work, client trust, and in some cases regulatory fines. The problem is most companies don't know what vulnerabilities they have until it's too late. Cloud configurations accumulate without review, code dependencies go outdated, and access controls get looser with every new employee. You don't need paranoia — you need visibility. A professional audit gives you exactly that: a clear risk map with priorities and concrete actions.
security.solutionDescription: I execute a complete review based on OWASP Top 10, the industry standard for web application security. I review your application, APIs, cloud configuration, and access controls. The result is an executive PDF report with each vulnerability classified by severity, technical evidence, and exact remediation steps your team can follow.
includes: Executive PDF report with technical evidence
security.hook: You get the report even if you don't hire the full remediation.

faqs.question: How much does an OWASP security audit cost?
faqs.answer: Cost depends on the scope: number of applications, APIs, and cloud configurations to review. Submit your project details and you'll receive a personalized proposal with exact pricing in 48 hours. No commitment required.

faqs.question: What does an OWASP Top 10 audit include?
faqs.answer: A complete review of the 10 most critical web application security risks: injection, broken authentication, sensitive data exposure, XML external entities, broken access control, security misconfiguration, XSS, insecure deserialization, components with known vulnerabilities, and insufficient logging.

faqs.question: Do you also fix the vulnerabilities you find?
faqs.answer: Yes. The audit includes remediation of critical vulnerabilities. You receive the executive report regardless of whether you hire the full remediation. For non-critical issues, the report includes detailed steps your team can follow.

faqs.question: How often should I audit my application?
faqs.answer: At minimum, after every major release or infrastructure change. For applications handling sensitive data (financial, healthcare, personal), quarterly audits are recommended.
